title: THE NEW MOON MURDER
description: On his first case with the Investigation Institute, they sent Deductive Logico to the darkest woods he'd never seen. From the shadows, he watched a witches' sabbath, thinking he was totally hidden. So he was shocked when three witches stopped the ceremony, walked over to him, and asked him to solve the murder of their sister witch.

suspects.name: LADY VIOLET
suspects.description: The heiress of the Violet Isles, the largest extra-judicial territory in the world.

suspects.name: VICE PRESIDENT MAUVE
suspects.description: A vice president of TekCo Futures. If she asks you to step into her metaverse, run.

suspects.name: THE DUCHESS OF VERMILLION
suspects.description: A tall, old woman with tall, old secrets. If she is the murderer, it certainly wouldn't be the first time.

weapons.name: A CAULDRON
weapons.description: If you can pick it up, you could hit someone with it. Or you can just give them a sip.

weapons.name: A LOG
weapons.description: A big, heavy oak log. Somebody killed the tree so that the tree could kill somebody.

weapons.name: A BROOM
weapons.description: People say that witches fly on these, but Logico's only swept with them.

locations.name: THE CENTRAL FIRE
locations.description: Scry the pyre fire, friar. Say that three times fast.

locations.name: THE ANCIENT RUINS
locations.description: Covered in moss, but still recognizably those same ruins.

locations.name: THE THICK FOREST
locations.description: The woods are lovely, dark, and deep, but an owl finds it all a hoot.

clues: A Virgo was standing beneath an owl, probably organizing something, because that's how they are.
Surprisingly, a cauldron was not in the central fire.

statements.speaker: Lady Violet
statements.statement: Don't believe the commoners: the Duchess of Vermillion brought a broom.

statements.speaker: Vice President Mauve
statements.statement: Well, I didn't bring a broom.

statements.speaker: The Duchess of Vermillion
statements.statement: And I didn't bring a log.
